au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.status

Class StatusUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.status.StatusUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class StatusUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Registers the rig client with a scheduling server, then periodically updates the scheduling server with the rig clients status.
    Interrupting the status updater will cause the status updater to shutdown by removing the scheduling server's rig client registration.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getServerIdentityTokens

        public static java.lang.String[] getServerIdentityTokens()
        Returns the current identity token and the identity token directly before the current identity token. The 0th value is the current identity token and the 1st is the one directly before.
        If the rig client is not registered or recently registered, the 0th or 1st values may be null.
        Returns:
        current and last identity token

      • isRegistered

        public static boolean isRegistered()
        Returns true if the rig client is registered with a scheduling server.
        Returns:
        true if registered

      • getNiceErrorMessage

        private java.lang.String getNiceErrorMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Returns a more descriptive error than is provided from the scheduling server, provided the error is a known type.
        Parameters:
        msg - message from server
        Returns:
        detailed error or provided message
